scripts.install:all: cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run install:all && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:backend: cd apps/backend && BACKEND_PORT=3001 npm run start:prod
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:gateway"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:gateway"
